languages.text: {n}Двигаясь медленно, словно под музыку, которую слышит лишь она сама, Кибелла снимает ритуальную маску. Мрачные тени вокруг глаз подчеркивают мертвенную бледность ее кожи, по которой рассыпаны многочисленные ритуальные шрамы.{/n} "Отныне я твоя тень, Домин'{name} фон Валанциус. Орудие смерти, что вложил в твою руку {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Неумирающий{/g}. Ибо так и должно было случиться. Ибо так и предсказали карты {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Двигаясь медленно, словно под музыку, которую слышит лишь она сама, Кибелла снимает ритуальную маску. Мрачные тени вокруг глаз подчеркивают мертвенную бледность ее кожи, по которой рассыпаны многочисленные ритуальные шрамы.{/n} "Отныне я твоя тень, Домин'{name} фон Валанциус. Орудие смерти, что вложил в твою руку {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Неумирающий{/g}. Ибо так и должно было случиться. Ибо так и предсказали карты {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah's movements are slow, almost rhythmic, as she removes her ceremonial mask. The dark shadows of her eyes accentuate the deathly pallor of her skin, which is covered in ritual scars.{/n} "Henceforth, I am your shadow, Domin'{name} von Valancius. An instrument of death placed in your hand by the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}. For so it was ordained, and so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke."
languages.original_text: {n}Двигаясь медленно, словно под музыку, которую слышит лишь она сама, Кибелла снимает ритуальную маску. Мрачные тени вокруг глаз подчеркивают мертвенную бледность ее кожи, по которой рассыпаны многочисленные ритуальные шрамы.{/n} "Отныне я твоя тень, Домин'{name} фон Валанциус. Орудие смерти, что вложил в твою руку {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Неумирающий{/g}. Ибо так и должно было случиться. Ибо так и предсказали карты {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Его Таро{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah's movements are slow, almost rhythmic, as she removes her ceremonial mask. The dark shadows of her eyes accentuate the deathly pallor of her skin, which is covered in ritual scars.{/n} "Henceforth, I am your shadow, Domin'{name} von Valancius. An instrument of death placed in your hand by the Undying One. For so it was ordained, and so His Tarot forespoke."

{n}Moving slowly, as though to the sound of music that only she can hear, Kibellah takes off her ceremonial mask. Dark shadows around her eyes accentuate the deathly pallor of her skin, which is covered in a multitude of ritual scars.{/n} "Henceforth I am your shadow, Enim'{name} von Valancius. An instrument of death put in your hand by the Undying One."

{n}Kibellah's movements are slow, almost rhythmic, as she removes her ceremonial mask. An instrument of death placed in your hand by the Undying One. For so it was ordained, and so His Tarot forespoke."

languages.text: {n}D'un mouvement lent, presque rythmique, Kibellah retire son masque cérémoniel. Sa peau, dont la pâleur semble comme accentuée par ses yeux sombres, est couverte de cicatrices rituelles.{/n} « Désormais, Domin'{name} von Valancius, je serai votre ombre. Un instrument de mort placé entre vos mains par l'{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Immortel{/g}. Car le destin en a voulu ainsi, et {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Son tarot{/g} sacré l'a prédit. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's movements are slow, almost rhythmic, as she removes her ceremonial mask. The dark shadows of her eyes accentuate the deathly pallor of her skin, which is covered in ritual scars.{/n} "Henceforth, I am your shadow, Domin'{name} von Valancius. An instrument of death placed in your hand by the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}. For so it was ordained, and so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un mouvement lent, presque rythmique, Kibellah retire son masque cérémoniel. Sa peau, dont la pâleur semble comme accentuée par ses yeux sombres, est couverte de cicatrices rituelles.{/n} « Désormais, Domin'{name} von Valancius, je serai votre ombre. Un instrument de mort placé entre vos mains par l'{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Immortel{/g}. Car le destin en a voulu ainsi, et {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Son tarot{/g} sacré l'a prédit. »

languages.text: {n}Los movimientos de Kibellah son lentos, casi rítmicos, mientras se quita la máscara ceremonial. Las sombras oscuras de sus ojos acentúan la palidez cadavérica de su piel, cubierta de cicatrices rituales.{/n} «De este momento en adelante, soy su sombra, Domin'{name} von Valancius. Un instrumento de muerte que el {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Inmortal{/g} pone a su disposición. Pues así se ha decretado, y así lo ha vaticinado {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's movements are slow, almost rhythmic, as she removes her ceremonial mask. The dark shadows of her eyes accentuate the deathly pallor of her skin, which is covered in ritual scars.{/n} "Henceforth, I am your shadow, Domin'{name} von Valancius. An instrument of death placed in your hand by the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}. For so it was ordained, and so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los movimientos de Kibellah son lentos, casi rítmicos, mientras se quita la máscara ceremonial. Las sombras oscuras de sus ojos acentúan la palidez cadavérica de su piel, cubierta de cicatrices rituales.{/n} «De este momento en adelante, soy su sombra, Domin'{name} von Valancius. Un instrumento de muerte que el {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Inmortal{/g} pone a su disposición. Pues así se ha decretado, y así lo ha vaticinado {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Su tarot{/g}».

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈摘下了她的仪式面具，动作既缓慢、又富有节奏感。她眼睛周围遍布幽深的黑影，与死一般苍白的皮肤形成了鲜明的对比，全身上下满是仪式留下的伤痕。{/n}“秘者{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，从今往后，我便是你的影子，是{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不死之神{/g}交予你的死亡秘器。因为这便是祂的安排，{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}祂的圣牌{/g}揭示了这样的预兆。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's movements are slow, almost rhythmic, as she removes her ceremonial mask. The dark shadows of her eyes accentuate the deathly pallor of her skin, which is covered in ritual scars.{/n} "Henceforth, I am your shadow, Domin'{name} von Valancius. An instrument of death placed in your hand by the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}. For so it was ordained, and so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈摘下了她的仪式面具，动作既缓慢、又富有节奏感。她眼睛周围遍布幽深的黑影，与死一般苍白的皮肤形成了鲜明的对比，全身上下满是仪式留下的伤痕。{/n}“秘者{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，从今往后，我便是你的影子，是{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不死之神{/g}交予你的死亡秘器。因为这便是祂的安排，{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}祂的圣牌{/g}揭示了这样的预兆。”

languages.text: {n}キベラの動きは遅く、リズムを刻んているかのように、仮面を外した。彼女の目の暗影が、儀式の傷跡で覆われた肌の死のような蒼白さを際立たせている。 {/n}「今後、私は御身の影となります、ドミン・{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不死の者{/g}により、あなたの手に置かれた死の道具なのです。それは定められたことであり、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}タロット{/g}が予言したことでもあります」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's movements are slow, almost rhythmic, as she removes her ceremonial mask. The dark shadows of her eyes accentuate the deathly pallor of her skin, which is covered in ritual scars.{/n} "Henceforth, I am your shadow, Domin'{name} von Valancius. An instrument of death placed in your hand by the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}. For so it was ordained, and so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの動きは遅く、リズムを刻んているかのように、仮面を外した。彼女の目の暗影が、儀式の傷跡で覆われた肌の死のような蒼白さを際立たせている。 {/n}「今後、私は御身の影となります、ドミン・{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}不死の者{/g}により、あなたの手に置かれた死の道具なのです。それは定められたことであり、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}タロット{/g}が予言したことでもあります」

languages.text: {n}Mit langsamen, fast rhythmischen Bewegungen nimmt Kibellah ihre zeremonielle Maske ab. Die dunklen Schatten ihrer Augen betonen die Leichenblässe ihrer mit rituellen Narben übersäten Haut{/n} "Fortan werde ich Euer Schatten sein, Domin'{name} von Valancius. Ein Instrument des Todes, vom {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Todlosen{/g} in Eure Hände gelegt." Denn so wurde es bestimmt und so hat es {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sein Tarot{/g} prophezeit."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's movements are slow, almost rhythmic, as she removes her ceremonial mask. The dark shadows of her eyes accentuate the deathly pallor of her skin, which is covered in ritual scars.{/n} "Henceforth, I am your shadow, Domin'{name} von Valancius. An instrument of death placed in your hand by the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}. For so it was ordained, and so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke."

Die dunklen Schatten ihrer Augen betonen die Leichenblässe ihrer mit rituellen Narben übersäten Haut{/n} "Fortan werde ich Euer Schatten sein, Domin'{name} von Valancius. Ein Instrument des Todes, vom {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Todlosen{/g} in Eure Hände gelegt." Denn so wurde es bestimmt und so hat es {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Sein Tarot{/g} prophezeit."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, tören maskesini çıkarırken âdeta ritmik bir şekilde yavaşça hareket ediyor. Gözlerindeki karanlık gölgeler, ayin yaralarıyla bezenmiş derisinin ölümü andıran solgunluğunu daha da belirginleştiriyor.{/n} "Bundan böyle senin gölgenim Domin'{name} von Valancius. {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Ölmeyen{/g} tarafından ellerine bırakılmış bir ölüm aracıyım. Çünkü böylesi emredildi ve {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}O'nun Tarotu{/g} böylesini öngördü."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's movements are slow, almost rhythmic, as she removes her ceremonial mask. The dark shadows of her eyes accentuate the deathly pallor of her skin, which is covered in ritual scars.{/n} "Henceforth, I am your shadow, Domin'{name} von Valancius. An instrument of death placed in your hand by the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Undying One{/g}. For so it was ordained, and so {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}His Tarot{/g} forespoke."
